title: Setup Angular Project Structure
description: Create the initial Angular project structure with proper folder organization and configuration files

user_stories: As a frontend developer, I want a properly structured Angular project so that I can efficiently develop features
business_rules: Project must follow Angular best practices for folder structure
Configuration files must be properly set up for development and production
edge_cases: Managing configuration files for different deployment targets

acceptance_criteria: Angular project is created with proper structure
Configuration files are set up correctly
Project can be built and served successfully
Folder structure follows Angular best practices

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Angular CLI best practices for project setup. Ensure proper configuration for development and production environments.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper configuration for production builds with security best practices
